data.title: Moto Weather
data.description: A full, MERN stack, web application with the aim to help motorcycle riders adapt to the changing weather.

data.title: weekend Warrior
data.description: A tool meant for hikers and campers to look up the conditions and weather, local to a hiking trail.

data.title: New York Times Scraper
data.description: A single page, MERN based scraper for the New York Times world page.

data.title: Brewery Browser
data.description: A simple, single page web application designed to make finding a brewery or alehouse in a target location an easy experience.

data.title: Trivia! Broken Car Edition
data.description: A trivia game, featuring a theme of a broken car!

data.title: Hangman - Broken Car Edition!
data.description: A word guess game, featuring a theme of common wear parts on a car.

data.title: Crystals Collector
data.description: A strategic guessing game, where the player has to reach a goal score to win with the psuedorandom values assigned, but hidden, at the start of the game.

data.title: Giphy Search
data.description: A Giphy API search client. Features toggling between still image and animated gif, user search buttons, and gif ratings.
